TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ConfigurationSettings extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides runtime versions 1.0 and 1.1 support for reading configuration sections and common configuration settings.

span.span: Provides runtime versions 1.0 and 1.1 support for reading configuration sections and common configuration settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks À l’aide des méthodes statiques et les propriétés de la type est la méthode recommandée pour la lecture des informations de configuration lors de l’exécution pour les applications des versions 1.0 et 1.1.Using the static methods and properties of the type is the recommended method for reading configuration information at runtime for versions 1.0 and 1.1 applications. > [!NOTE] > La classe fournit une compatibilité descendante uniquement.The class provides backward compatibility only. Pour les nouvelles applications, vous devez utiliser le classe ou classe à la place.For new applications you should use the class or class instead. Pour utiliser ces deux classes, vous devez ajouter une référence dans votre projet ou votre application à l’espace de noms System.Configuration.To use these two classes, you must add a reference in your project or application to the System.Configuration namespace.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AppSettings As NameValueCollection

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This property is obsolete. Please use System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.AppSettings")

summary.span: Gets a read-only of the application settings section of the configuration file.

span.span: Gets a read-only of the application settings section of the configuration file.

value.span: En lecture seule de la section de paramètres d’application à partir du fichier de configuration.

span.span: A read-only of the application settings section from the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Le `appSettings` élément de la section du fichier de configuration contient une série de paires nom/valeur que votre application peut utiliser d’autres fins.The `appSettings` section element of the configuration file contains a series of name/value pairs that your application can use for any purpose. Cette méthode est déconseillée et est conservée pour compatibilité descendante.This method is deprecated and is maintained for backward compatibility. Utilisez plutôt la méthode GetSection.Please use the GetSection method instead. > [!NOTE] > La classe fournit une compatibilité descendante uniquement.The class provides backward compatibility only. Vous devez utiliser le classe ou classe à la place.You should use the class or class instead.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This method is obsolete, it has been replaced by System.Configuration!System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.GetSection")

param.name: sectionName
param.span: A configuration name and path, such as "system.net/settings".

span.span: A configuration name and path, such as "system.net/settings".

summary.span: Returns the object for the passed configuration section name and path.

span.span: Returns the object for the passed configuration section name and path.

returns.span: The object for the passed configuration section name and path.

span.span: The object for the passed configuration section name and path.

block.para: The class provides backward compatibility only. You should use the class or class instead.
The class provides backward compatibility only. You should use the class or class instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cette méthode est déconseillée et est conservée pour compatibilité descendante.This method is deprecated and is maintained for backward compatibility. Utilisez plutôt la méthode GetSection.Please use the GetSection method instead.

exception.span: Unable to retrieve the requested section.

span.span: Unable to retrieve the requested section.
